ValidationRule.description: This will require the PEO/ASO opty to be created in the qualified or gained access state
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( not(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Qualified')), not(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Gained Access')), isnew(), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Administrator')), OR(RecordType.Id='012500000000ntY',RecordType.Id='012500000000n4V',RecordType.Id='0120g000000EAgt',RecordType.Id='0120g000000EAgo'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Opportunities can only be created in the "Qualified" or "Gained Access" status.
